item.description:
I have never been to this bar before, but based on the few responses from people in town this location should work for everyone. Lets get together for the final regular season game and cheer on our Bears for a fourth consecutive victory and hopefully a playoff spot.

If you can not find me you can call me on my cell phone @ 315-506-0040. I hope everyone had a great holiday, and I look forward to seeing you all on Sunday.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a Chicago Bears T-shirt and try to have a meetup sign with me.

group.name: Chicago Sports Club of New England

item.name: Week # 17 Bears vs. Texans
